text:
Hi!!
Sorry for not having got in touch before, I had all my deadlines this week. And thank you for the extensive reply as well!
Eventhough I finished my animation on Monday, I do want to improve some little things I couldn't improve before the deadline. Luckily through that project I've become more or less comfortable with the drawing tools :) (I followed that tutorial last month), I will start using more pencil though as I understand it's a lot easier to modify the shapes etc. 

Luckily now I'm free to learn as much a possible and be very active here. If it's alright, I can get a few modules done and send my work to you by next Wednesday.

I will make the improvements and update my portfolio with it by next Monday so I'll send you the link as soon as I have it updated. I'm very excited to show it and hopefully get feedback so I can improve my next projects :sunflower:. 

I have seen your work and I really love it I can't wait to see the updated version.

Again thank you very much for all your time honestly it's very helpful:)
